content: ssk k to 3 stitches before end of instep k2tog k2 ssk k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 round 2 k all stitches repeat these two rounds until 20 24 stitches remain break yarn and graft toes using kitchener stitch i designed these socks for my father keith slater he has heart failure and has been in and out of hospital this year and really appreciates having handknitted socks to keep his feet warm the pattern is offered for free but if you have enjoyed knitting it i d love it if you wanted to make a donation to the british heart foundation via https //www justgiving com/fundraising/keithsocks
